com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils

Interface NonBlockingSemaphore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleNonBlockingSemaphore

    public interface NonBlockingSemaphore
    A counting semaphore that does not block the thread when the requested resource is not available. No actual resource objects are used; the semaphore just keeps a count of the number available and acts accordingly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NonBlockingSemaphore.Factory
      Abstract factory for creating concrete instances of classes implementing NonBlockingSemaphore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acquire()
      Acquires a resource if available.
      boolean acquire(int resources)
      Acquires the specified number of resources if they all are available.
      boolean release()
      Releases a resource returning it to this semaphore.
      boolean release(int resources)
      Releases the specified number of resources returning it to this semaphore.

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        boolean acquire()
        Acquires a resource if available.

        An invocation of this method yields exactly the same result as acquire(1)

        Returns:
        true if the resource has been acquired; false otherwise.

      • acquire

        boolean acquire(int resources)
        Acquires the specified number of resources if they all are available.
        Returns:
        true if all the requested resources have been acquired; false otherwise.

      • release

        boolean release()
        Releases a resource returning it to this semaphore.

        An invocation of this method yields exactly the same result as release(1)

        Returns:
        true if the resource has been released; false otherwise.

      • release

        boolean release(int resources)
        Releases the specified number of resources returning it to this semaphore.
        Returns:
        true if all the requested resources have been released; false otherwise.
